device.Description: A powerful gaming laptop with RTX graphics for AAA gaming and content creation.
device.YesRAM: 16GB DDR5 RAM for smooth gaming and multitasking
device.YesProcessor: Intel Core i7 delivers excellent gaming performance

test_scenarios: Can I run video editing software?
Can I play AAA games like Cyberpunk 2077?
Is this better than HP Pavilion?

expected_responses.video_editing: Yes - RTX 4060 GPU and 16GB RAM handle video editing well, including 4K editing
expected_responses.gaming: Yes - RTX 4060 runs most AAA games at high settings, 1080p 60+ FPS
expected_responses.comparison: Better than HP Pavilion for gaming due to dedicated RTX GPU
